description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军将领、海军上将，曾任中央军事委员会委员、中央军委政治工作部主任。2024年起因涉嫌严重违纪违法被调查，后被开除党籍军籍。
description.en: Former general and admiral of the People's Liberation Army Navy, who served as a member of the Central Military Commission and Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission. He was investigated for suspected serious violations of discipline and law starting in 2024, and was later expelled from the Party and the military.

description.zh-cn: 原福州军区政治部副主任，曾任第三十一军政委，是苗华的岳父。
description.en: Former deputy director of the Political Department of the Fuzhou Military Region, served as political commissar of the 31st Army, and was Miao Hua's father-in-law.

description.zh-cn: 苗华的妻子。
description.en: Wife of Miao Hua.

description.zh-cn: 苗华的儿子。
description.en: Son of Miao Hua.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军上将，曾任兰州军区政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force who served as Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任兰州军区副政治委员、政治部主任。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as Deputy Political Commissar and Director of the Political Department of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任兰州军区副政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as Deputy Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军陆军第十二集团军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army who served as Political Commissar of the 12th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军中将，曾任中国人民解放军陆军第十二集团军政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force who served as Political Commissar of the 12th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army.

degree.zh-cn: 管理工程专业本科学历

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1969年12月参军，2025年10月17日被开除军籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the army in December 1969 and was expelled from the military on October 17, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 苗华于1973年9月入党，2025年10月17日被开除党籍。
description.en: Miao Hua joined the Party in September 1973 and was expelled on October 17, 2025.

position.en: Deputy Political Commissar and Secretary of the Discipline Inspection Commission

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 先后担任中国共产党和中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员。
description.en: Successively served as a member of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 苗华是叶汉林的女婿。
description.en: Miao Hua is Ye Hanlin's son-in-law.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第七十三集团军

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替张阳担任中央军事委员会政治工作部主任。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded Zhang Yang as Director of the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替刘晓江，担任中国人民解放军海军政治委员。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded Liu Xiaojiang as Political Commissar of the PLA Navy.

description.zh-cn: 苗华卸任中国人民解放军海军政治委员，由秦生祥接任。
description.en: Miao Hua stepped down as Political Commissar of the PLA Navy and was succeeded by Qin Shengxiang.

description.zh-cn: 苗华接替到龄退休的李长才，担任兰州军区政治委员。
description.en: Miao Hua succeeded the retiring Li Changcai as Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 苗华卸任兰州军区政治委员，由刘雷接任。
description.en: Miao Hua stepped down as Political Commissar of the Lanzhou Military Region and was succeeded by Liu Lei.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 中共中央研究决定对涉嫌严重违纪的苗华停职检查。
description.en: The Central Committee of the Communist Party of China decided to suspend Miao Hua from his duties for investigation into suspected serious violations of discipline.

relationships.source: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 正式免除苗华的中华人民共和国中央军事委员会委员职务。
description.en: Formally removed Miao Hua from his position as a member of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华党籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the party.

description.zh-cn: 开除苗华军籍。
description.en: Expelled Miao Hua from the military.
